## KeyHandler type

Key handler function type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type KeyHandler<State, Components extends Record<string, unknown>> = (ctx: EventContext<State, Components>) => void;
```
**References:** [EventContext](./dsl.eventcontext.md)

## Remarks

Key handlers are registered via [AppBuilder.onKey()](./dsl.appbuilder.onkey.md) and receive an [EventContext](./dsl.eventcontext.md) with the current state and component views. Handlers can update state or quit the application.
